Reviews.Title: “This is a very good extended stay hotel.”
Reviews.Author: YourNextGuest
Reviews.Content: staff run tidy ship doesnt cost dont expect ritz carlton value youll kitchen fridge instead little ones cant fit pizza youre staying little suburban choice

Reviews.Title: “Excellent month stay!”
Reviews.Author: banston
Reviews.Content: live 1 month time country hotel stay month buildings extremely clean kept service anytime cleaned cleaned nice sushi thai american mexican restaurants 1 mile gym 23 miles free guests 2 malls movie theatre 34 miles trader joes grocery store 3 miles cons close interstate noise internet slow 15 minutes downtown leave 7am summary clean safe
